About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Hi, I'm Jackie Siperko. I have worked in IT my whole professional career. Why coding? Since the beginning of my career I have taken classes here and there in programming. Finally after finishing 10 years homeschooling my son I decided to dive deeper in learning to code and realized I love it. I am in SkillCrush's Break into Tech BootCamp and also a Microsoft Web Developer Program at our local Community College. My hope is to re-launch my career as a back end developer.

CERTIFICATIONS:

  • Fundamentals of MVS/ESA

  • Crystal Reporting
  • Intro to Javascript
